title: Zots Goes to School
subtle: Fantasy (fiction), 103 words, Level E (Grade 1), Lexile 240L, Fiction Series
description: How are you supposed to behave when you are at school? Silly Zots doesn't know because he is from outer space! Lucky for him, his best friend Abby comes to the rescue. In Zots Goes to School, Abby teaches Zots everything he needs to know about proper school conduct. A fun and engaging story will amuse readers while they learn about cause-and-effect relationships. This book can also be used to teach students how to connect to prior knowledge to understand text and to use quotation marks correctly.
reviewWords: behave, focus, learn, listen, try, work
comprehension: Cause and Effect                : Identify cause-and-effect relationships
awareness: Initial Sound                : Discriminate initial consonant /z/ sound
grammar: Quotation Marks                : Recognize and use quotation marks
wordWork: High-Frequency Words : Identify and use the high-frequency word says
